book.title: Tooth loss may affect ability to carry out everyday tasks
book.description: Older adults with more natural teeth are better able to perform everyday tasks

book.title: A gentler strategy for avoiding childhood dental decay
book.description: The combination of a carb-heavy diet and poor oral hygiene can leave children with early childhood caries

book.title: AI helps predict treatment outcomes for patients with diseased dental implants
book.description: Peri-implantitis, a condition where tissue and bone around dental implants becomes infected, besets roughly one-quarter of dental implant patients

book.title: Ventilation assessment by carbon dioxide levels in dental treatment rooms
book.description: Carbon dioxide (CO2) is a byproduct of human metabolism and exists in high levels in exhaled air, and is therefore often used as a proxy for indoor air quality

book.title: The Sundered Grail
book.description: Researchers at the University Zurich have mapped the first complete atlas of single cells that make up the human teeth
